meanings.definition: The condition of having an abnormally high number of lymphocytes in the blood.
meanings.sent1: Her lymphocytoses were concerning to the doctor.
meanings.sent2: The test results showed lymphocytoses in his blood work.
meanings.sent3: Despite her small size, her lymphocytoses seemed to be in a competition of their own.
meanings.sent4: The classroom was filled with a sea of lymphocytoses, each one representing a different student.
meanings.sent5: The garden of lymphocytoses bloomed brightly in the sunlight, a beautiful but unusual sight.

meanings.definition: The presence of an excessive amount of lymphocytes in the body.
meanings.sent1: The lymphocytoses in his body were causing health issues.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the implications of the lymphocytoses in her system.
meanings.sent3: His lymphocytoses partied all night, causing chaos in his body.
meanings.sent4: The army of lymphocytoses fought bravely against the infection invading the body.
meanings.sent5: The jungle of lymphocytoses in his body was a battleground for health and illness.
